Pod:

It was the signal of a pod in a Maximal frecuency. The signal came so=
me where around the place where  the Pacificus were
  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: rm2kmidi 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, Ju=
ly 11, 2005 12:31 PM
  Subject: Re: Pasificus Maximals


  Peseus had compl=
eted searching the room.  They found that it was
  almost a perfect square =
metal room, with some sort of a metal door at
  one end which was almost as=
 wide as that whole side of the room.  He
  was just about to call another =
"meeting" when a signal came over the
  radio.

  "Well, at least I know my=
 radio still works." he said to himself as he
  tried to get to where the s=
ignal was strongest, "Hello, is somebody
  there?"

  The others seemed to =
notice that he was talking to himself, but remained quiet.

  On 7/8/05, Ai=
rly <airly2002@...> wrote:
  > ????:
  >  
  > A slight signal star=
ted to appear in Pacificus's chanel
  > 
  > ----- Original Message ----- 
=
  > From: rm2kmidi 
  > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  > Sent: Friday, July =
08, 2005 7:30 PM
  > Subject: Pasificus Maximals
  > 
  > NPCS:
  > 
  > Th=
ere is darkness.  Small lights flicker in the distance, some tired
  > groa=
ning and shuffling of feet.  Lord Perseus stands to his feet, and
  > think=
s of something to say.
  > 
  > "Who's out there?  Is everyone allright?"
 =
 > 
  > The flickering lights move closer.  They dont' say a word.
  > 
  >=
 "Friend or Foe?"
  > 
  > He is now surrounded by at least 3 pairs of ligh=
ts.
  > 
  > "Who is that?" asked a voice in the darkness.
  > 
  > "I mean=
 you no harm, I just awoke here and I have no idea what is going on."
  > 
=
  > "I think we all just woke up not 20 minutes ago.  We were trying to
  >=
 find a way out of this room, or cave.   We're not certain where we
  > are=
.  Perhaps you can help us."
  > 
  > "I guess that's would be the prudent =
thing to do; first let me know
  > your names?  I'm Perseus"
  > 
  > "....=
"
  > 
  > "Or not..... I guess you're not up for a converstation.  Ok, let=
s
  > search every wall and try to find what kind of room this is.  OK?"
  =
> 
  > There was a grunt in agreement, then everyone spread out.
  >
